name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minute – A timer to track your scrolling time

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small timer designed to keep you exploring without losing track of time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a simple, always visible timer to any website you choose, keeping you aware of how long you have been browsing — so you can stay in control.

Some facts 
- The timer stays on your screen, no matter where you scroll.
- Keep track of time on distracting sites like social media.
- Choose the websites where the timer is displayed.
- A no-fuss tool that works seamlessly in the background.
